data.title: USD to AED: Convert US Dollars to United Arab Emirates Dirhams
data.meta_description: Use the USD to AED currency converter at Exchange-Rates.org for accurate and up-to-date exchange rates. Easily convert US Dollars to United Arab Emirates Dirhams with real-time data.
data.text:
Frequently Asked Question about USD to AED

How much is 1 US Dollar in United Arab Emirates Dirhams?

1 US Dollar = 3.6730 United Arab Emirates Dirhams as of August 19, 2024 12:55 PM UTC. You can get live exchange rates between US Dollars and United Arab Emirates Dirhams using exchange-rates.org, which aggregates real-time forex data from the most authoritative sources.

How much is 100 US Dollars in United Arab Emirates Dirhams?

As of August 19, 2024 12:55 PM UTC, 100 US Dollars is equivalent to 367.30 United Arab Emirates Dirhams. The exchange rate at this time is 3.6730 United Arab Emirates Dirhams per US Dollar.

What was the highest USD to AED exchange rate in the last 10 years?

In the last 10 years, the highest rate from US Dollars to United Arab Emirates Dirhams was on January 25, 2015 when each US Dollar was worth 3.6964 United Arab Emirates Dirhams.

When is the best time to convert USD to AED?

The USD and AED can be traded 24x5, starting from the time markets open on Monday mornings in Sydney until they close on Fridays at 5 PM in New York. Exchange rates can fluctuate by the minute while markets are open. However, the period between 3-4 PM GMT is often a good time to convert US Dollars to United Arab Emirates Dirhams because currency market liquidity and trading volume tend to be the highest during this time. Additionally, it's advisable to convert US Dollars to United Arab Emirates Dirhams early in the week if you need AED urgently. Executing a trade late in the week might result in a delayed settlement until the following week, as forex markets are closed on weekends.

Which is stronger, the US Dollar or the United Arab Emirates Dirham?

The US Dollar is currently stronger than the United Arab Emirates Dirham, as 1 USD is equal to 3.6730 AED. Conversely, 1 AED is worth 0.2723 USD.

Is the US Dollar up or down against the United Arab Emirates Dirham?

The US Dollar has increased +0.004% year-to-date against the United Arab Emirates Dirham. Over the past 10 years, the US Dollar has appreciated 0.00% against the United Arab Emirates Dirham. Consequently, the US Dollar has gained purchasing power compared to the United Arab Emirates Dirham over the last decade.

What's the best USD to AED exchange rate today?

As of August 19, 2024 12:55 PM UTC, the best USD to AED exchange rate is 3.6730 AED. This means that for every US Dollar you exchange, you will receive 3.6730 United Arab Emirates Dirhams.
